channel.title: Rs2006
channel.description: Well larger servers in the past have had trouble with JaGeX in the past like battle-scape, so don't you think a server like rs2006 is going to be killed by JaGeX before it even gets a chance to start? discuss.

item.title: Rs2006
item.dc:creator: @heatrn11 heatrn11
item.description:
@heatrn11 wrote:

[quote=“vManlyMan, post:33, topic:431465”][quote author=heatrn11 link=topic=534142.msg3905255#msg3905255 date=1328153905]

I wonder if you could buy an old revision of runescape from Jagex, however fully “finished”. Maybe one day when the game has died off they’ll release all of that stuff, and the game will become open sourced.

They are going to make there own remake, like they did rs classic, Just watch… and then it will get more players then actual Ruescape.

Unlikely but they will have a large player base as it is right now more then half the community started in 2009+ .
My guess is when they finally run out of things to uselessly update and remodel they’ll release a 2006 world.

If you joined rs in 2009 You know NOTHING…

Just stating.
[/quote]

3 years is a long time for playing Runescape…[/quote]
But if you played for 3 years, you haven’t experienced the true runescape, Like the fun things.
For example Falador massacre.
No grand exchange (so it was more challenging to get items)
The players were much nicer…
And Jagex actually made good Updates.

Read full topic

item.title: Rs2006
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Mopar1 Mr Mopar
item.description:
@Mr_Mopar1 wrote:

[quote=“heatrn11, post:27, topic:431465”][quote author=xI c E link=topic=534142.msg3905165#msg3905165 date=1328150802]

I wonder if you could buy an old revision of runescape from Jagex, however fully “finished”. Maybe one day when the game has died off they’ll release all of that stuff, and the game will become open sourced.

They are going to make there own remake, like they did rs classic, Just watch… and then it will get more players then actual Ruescape.

That will never happen. Hate to tell you, but it won’t.

why not?
[/quote]More players than actual Runescape? Not going to happen If they brought that much attention to themselves, jagex would be sure to do something about it

I mean if Jagex makes there own remake, then that remake will have more players then Actual Runescape

The chance of that happening is significantly low.

Yup, probably will never happen.[/quote]
I remember an interview about a year or two ago Andrew Gower did, and the question was brought up about a early runescape 2 revision being made.He mentioned that he liked the idea, but he didn’t know if it was going to happen.
Just wanted to point that out.

Read full topic
